scripts.serve: parcel serve browser-application/index.html --out-file index --out-dir browser-bundle/ --public-url ./ --target browser --hmr-hostname localhost --hmr-port 6789 --port 8080
scripts.bundle: parcel build browser-application/index.html --out-file index --out-dir browser-bundle/ --public-url ./ --target browser --no-source-maps
scripts.build-all: npm run clean && npm run pack:linux32 && npm run pack:linux64 && npm run pack:win32 && npm run pack:win64 && npm run pack:osx
scripts.pack-linux32: npm run build-clean && npm run bundle && npm run build-linux32
scripts.pack-linux64: npm run build-clean && npm run bundle && npm run build-linux64
scripts.pack-win32: npm run build-clean && npm run bundle && npm run build-win32
scripts.pack-win64: npm run build-clean && npm run bundle && npm run build-win64
